code: import{useState}from"react";import{motion}from"framer-motion";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Gallery(){const[filter,setFilter]=useState("All");const images=[{title:"Peacock Drawing",type:"Drawing",image:"https://source.unsplash.com/600x400/?drawing,art"},{title:"Nature Sketch",type:"Drawing",image:"https://source.unsplash.com/600x400/?pencil,sketch"},{title:"Poster Design",type:"Photoshop",image:"https://source.unsplash.com/600x400/?poster,design"},{title:"Creative Edit",type:"Photoshop",image:"https://source.unsplash.com/600x400/?photoshop,edit"}];const filtered=filter==="All"?images:images.filter(img=>img.type===filter);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-white text-gray-800 p-6 md:p-16",id:"gallery",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.h2,{className:"text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-8 text-blue-900",initial:{opacity:0},whileInView:{opacity:1},transition:{duration:1},children:"\uD83C\uDFA8 My Gallery"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center gap-4 mb-8",children:["All","Drawing","Photoshop"].map(cat=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`px-4 py-2 rounded-full border ${filter===cat?"bg-blue-600 text-white":"bg-gray-200 text-black"}`,onClick:()=>setFilter(cat),children:cat},cat))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:filtered.map((img,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"rounded overflow-hidden shadow-lg border",initial:{opacity:0,scale:0.8},whileInView:{opacity:1,scale:1},transition:{delay:index*0.2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img.image,alt:img.title,className:"w-full h-48 object-cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-bold",children:img.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:img.type})]})]},index))})]});}export default Gallery;
